Events that occurred on 23 November.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1953 - Composer Johan de Meij is born.
1962 – The literary supplement of The Times runs a review of The Adventures of Tom Bombadil.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 343a.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 344.
2000 – Rayner Unwin, without whom The Hobbit would never have been published, dies.
2002 - Ring*Con 2002 in Bonn, Germany.
2009 - Parma Eldalamberon issue 18 is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
